newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Chad Therapeutics rated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Chad Therapeutics rated.

text.p: -- McDonald & Co analyst Christopher Caton said Tuesday he began coverage of Chad Therapeutics Inc with a buy rating and a 12- to 18-month price target of $21 a share.
-- Chad makes and markets a broad line of oxygen conservation devices that increase the efficiency of standard oxygen delivery systems used to treat patients with respiratory diseases.
-- "(Chad's) products provide an average of seven-to-one savings over standard delivery systems and are just as clinically effective as continuous supply devices," Caton said in a report.
-- He added that demand for Chad's products is expected to continue to grow rapidly.
-- Chad shares were up 1/8 at 17-5/8 early Tuesday afternoon.
